reviewText:
I own all four films in their original DVD form, the expensive way compared to this British Film Collection. A bargain if you count the cost per feature. All four are star studded, terrific stories, they type you will watch repeatedly. Each a five-star film with top actors, writing, and cinematography.
A sure fire "please" if you buy it and gift it to Brit film lovers. Best buy 2 if you are gifting, you will not want to give away your own copy.
The films are excellent.  I love Dames Judi Dench and Maggie Smith.  Jane Eyre was enjoyable and the Unfinished Song was superb.
